* install ollama
* launch llama3

```
34224  sudo ps -a -o %cpu,%mem,comm,pid,ppid > shot.1
34225  stress --cpu 2 --timeout 20 & # wait a couple of seconds
34226  sudo ps -a -o %cpu,%mem,comm,pid,ppid > shot.2
```

```
% cat q1 | jq '.response' -r | tr -d '\n'

Please provide the lines you'd like me to compare, and I'll be happy to help you identify which one uses more RAM than before.% 

% cat q2 | jq '.response' -r | tr -d '\n'
```
